author: Rédaction
title: Pour créer de l’ombre dans son jardin, 5 arbres brise-vue à planter en septembre
text:
Septembre est un moment idéal pour de nouvelles plantations dans le jardin, particulièrement pour les arbres brise-vue. Ce mois bénéficie d’une terre encore chaude, offrant des conditions parfaites pour que les arbres prennent racine avant l’hiver.
Cyprès Photo : Shutterstock Ce conifère est parfait pour créer une haie brise-vue grâce à son feuillage persistant et sa résistance à la sécheresse. Planté à 1,5 mètre de distance, il peut atteindre 20 mètres.
Buis Photo : Shutterstock Facile à cultiver, le buis, originaire de la Méditerranée, mesure entre 5 et 6 mètres de haut. Il s’adapte à divers types de sols et préfère être planté en automne pour mieux s’enraciner.
Thuya Photo : Shutterstock Comme le cyprès, le thuya est un arbre persistant et peu exigeant. Il constitue une excellente haie brise-vue, offrant une protection toute l’année.
If Photo : Shutterstock L’if, prisé pour ses haies denses et persistantes, est parfait pour protéger des regards indiscrets. Bien qu’il pousse lentement, il devient une véritable barrière végétale.
Arbres fruitiers Photo : Shutterstock Les cerisiers, pommiers, pruniers et pêchers, plantés en septembre, donnent non seulement des fruits savoureux mais offrent également de l’ombre dans le jardin. Assurez-vous d’enrichir le sol avec du compost et du terreau pour favoriser leur croissance.
Buis : 3 conseils d’entretien pour avoir un bel arbuste dans son jardin VIDÉO. Un lundi matin, elle parvient à faire chanter les passagers d’un train Pour que votre haie fleurisse toute l’année, voici 8 arbustes à privilégier 7 plantes à ne surtout pas planter dans votre jardin si vous êtes allergique au pollen

author: mesabitribune.com
title: FDA Approves Qfitlia to Cut Bleeding Episodes in Patients With Hemophilia | Health | mesabitribune.com
text: WEDNESDAY, April 2, 2025 (HealthDay News) -- The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has approved Qfitlia (fitusiran) for routine prophylaxis to prevent or reduce the frequency of bleeding episodes in adult and pediatric patients 12 years of age and older with hemophilia A or hemophilia B, with or without factor VIII or IX inhibitors (neutralizing antibodies). Subcutaneous Qfitlia does not replace the missing coagulation factor VIII or IX, but reduces the amount of the protein antithrombin, leading to an increase in thrombin, an enzyme critical for blood clotting. Dosing starts at once every two months and is based on the FDA-cleared INNOVANCE Antithrombin companion diagnostic test (Siemens). Fixed dosing of Qfitlia is not approved due to excessive clotting risk. Qfitlia has a boxed warning for thrombotic events and gallbladder disease. The most common side effects reported were viral infection, nasopharyngitis, and bacterial infection. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. author: GB Times
title: Canʼt send emails to Gmail accounts?
text:
Can’t Send Emails to Gmail Accounts?
Are you having trouble sending emails to Gmail accounts? You’re not alone! Many users have reported issues sending emails to Gmail addresses, and it’s not uncommon for it to be a frustrating and seemingly inexplicable problem. In this article, we’ll explore some of the common causes and solutions to help you resolve this issue and get your emails delivered successfully to Gmail accounts.
Common Causes
Before we dive into the solutions, it’s essential to understand the common causes of the problem. Here are some possible reasons why you can’t send emails to Gmail accounts:
• Spam Filter : Gmail’s strict spam filter can block your emails, especially if they contain suspicious or unusual content. Make sure your emails are well-structured, and the content is relevant and useful.
• Domain Keys and SPF Records : If your domain doesn’t have DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) and SPF (Sender Policy Framework) records set up correctly, your emails may be flagged as spam.
• Email Client or Server Configuration : Issues with your email client or server configuration can prevent your emails from being delivered.
• Firewall or Anti-Virus Software : Firewalls or anti-virus software can block your emails or intercept them before they reach the recipient’s server.
• Network Issues : Connectivity problems, such as a weak or intermittent internet connection, can cause your emails to bounce back.
Solutions
Here are some solutions to help you resolve the issue of not being able to send emails to Gmail accounts:
1. Check Your Spam Filter
Use a Plain Text Email : Gmail’s spam filter is more likely to block emails with HTML content. Try sending a plain text email to see if it gets delivered successfully.
Avoid Suspicious Words or Phrases : Spam filters are triggered by certain keywords and phrases. Avoid using words like "win a prize," "make money," or "order now" in your subject line or body.
2. Verify Your DKIM and SPF Records
DKIM : DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) is a digital signature that helps prevent spamming. Make sure your domain has a DKIM record set up correctly.
SPF : SPF (Sender Policy Framework) is a TXT record that verifies the authenticity of your email sender. Ensure your SPF record is set up correctly to avoid flagging your emails as spam.
Table: DKIM and SPF Record Examples
Record Type
Example
DKIM Record
k=rsa; p=MIGfMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBAQUAA4GNADCBiQKBgQC…
SPF Record
v=spf1 include:spf.mktomain.com -all
3. Check Your Email Client or Server Configuration
Check Your Server Configuration : Make sure your email server is configured correctly. Consult your hosting provider or email client support documentation if you’re unsure.
Verify Your Email Client Settings : Check your email client settings to ensure they are configured correctly. You can refer to your email client’s user manual for guidance.
4. Whitelist Your IP Address
Request Removal from Blacklists : Check if your IP address is listed on blacklists like Spamhaus or Commtouch. If it is, request removal from the blacklists to resolve the issue.
Whitelist Your IP Address : Ask the Gmail administrators to whitelist your IP address to prevent blockages.
5. Test Your Email Configuration
Send a Test Email : Send a test email to a Gmail account using a different email client or server. This will help you determine if the issue is specific to your email client or server.
6. Check Your Network Settings
Check Your Internet Connection : Ensure your internet connection is stable and secure.
Disable Firewalls and Anti-Virus Software : Temporarily disable firewalls and anti-virus software to see if it resolves the issue.
Conclusion
In this article, we’ve explored some common causes and solutions for not being able to send emails to Gmail accounts. By following these steps, you can identify and resolve the issue, ensuring that your emails reach their intended recipients successfully. Remember to check your spam filter, verify your DKIM and SPF records, and troubleshoot your email client or server configuration to get started.

author: Staff Writer
title: Iran: esecuzione pubblica di un prigioniero a Najafabad dopo 8 anni di reclusione per aver ucciso un agente del regime nel 2004 - Consiglio Nazionale della Resistenza Iraniana
text: Esecuzione di sette prigionieri mercoledì In un atto atroce e tragico, il regime oppressivo iraniano ha giustiziato un prigioniero giovedì 28 dicembre, con un’impiccagione pubblica a Najafabad, per l’uccisione di un agente delle Forze di Sicurezza di Stato (SSF) avvenuta quasi 19 anni fa. Secondo i rapporti dei media gestiti dallo stato, la vittima, insieme ad altri due individui accusati di aver ucciso un agente delle SSF durante uno scontro nel 2004, è stata arrestata nel 2015. Dopo aver trascorso otto anni dietro le sbarre, è stato impiccato pubblicamente oggi a Najafabad. Inoltre, mercoledì 27 dicembre, sette prigionieri hanno affrontato il patibolo per mano degli esecutori del regime di Khomeini. Tre di loro sono stati identificati come Esmaeil Ghader Magham (Barahui), Ahmad Gorgij, e un altro prigioniero appartenente ai compatrioti Baluchi. Allo stesso tempo, Mohammad Hesari nel carcere di Birjand, Akbar Qareghozloo, Ehsan Hamidi, e un altro prigioniero di nome Ali Akbar nel carcere di Qezelhasar sono stati anch’essi giustiziati. Martedì 26 dicembre, gli esecutori giudiziari del regime hanno eseguito la condanna a morte di un prigioniero chiamato Mohammad Reza Mehraban nel carcere centrale di Sanandaj, e il 23 dicembre, quattro prigionieri sono stati giustiziati nel carcere centrale di Isfahan. I nomi di due di loro erano stati annunciati in una dichiarazione precedente, mentre gli altri due prigionieri erano Shir Ali Saeed e Saman Mogoii. La crescente tendenza delle esecuzioni, in particolare delle esecuzioni pubbliche, viene utilizzata dal regime dei mullah come strumento per instillare paura e prevenire potenziali rivolte. Rimanere in silenzio di fronte a questi crimini disumani va contro i principi ben consolidati dei diritti umani. La Resistenza Iraniana invita le Nazioni Unite, l’Unione Europea e altre pertinenti organizzazioni internazionali a intraprendere azioni urgenti per salvare la vita di coloro che sono in attesa di esecuzione. Ali Khamenei, Ebrahim Raisi e gli altri leader di questo regime devono essere ritenuti responsabili per quattro decenni di crimini contro l’umanità e genocidio. Segretariato del Consiglio Nazionale della Resistenza Iraniana 28 Dicembre 2023
